definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: I know a good one on Yenping South Road.
sentences.chinese: 我知道在延平南路上有一家不錯的日本料理店。

sentences.english: It's Korea taste BBQ. Book seat in advance.
sentences.chinese: 這是一家韓國料理店，挺火，需要預約位置。

sentences.english: We had dinner at a Japanese restaurant last night.
sentences.chinese: 我們昨晚去一家日本料理店用餐。

sentences.english: One day at a certain Japanese restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 某天大貝貝在日本料理店。

sentences.english: Apply to decorate the japanese style family extensively, the Japanese restaurant, the soup bath of hot spring, etc.
sentences.chinese: 廣泛應用於家庭和風裝飾，日本料理店，溫泉湯浴等。

sentences.english: Hai Lao Sushi Japanese Restaurant with new concept welcomes you.
sentences.chinese: 新概念日式料理店海老壽司歡迎您。

definition: Japanese cuisine (abbr. for 日本料理[Ri4 ben3 liao4 li3])
izakaya (a kind of traditional Japanese pub)
set meal (esp. in a Japanese restaurant)
tempura/deep-fried cooking/also called 甜不辣[tian2 bu4 la4]
